attributes.action: have the same rules concerning expenses for MP's as for other employed people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Employees have fixed rules regarding claiming expenses. Expenses only paid against receipts, auditing of the suitability of the expense, expenses paid at IR rates for example. As the setter of the rules MP's should, as an example, abide them themselves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
